title.rendered: canon ts3122 setup – canon pixma ts3122

content.rendered:
Search
Search

Canon Ts3122 Setup : Start Your Pixma TS3122 | TS Series

 

Access all features of Pixma series from ij.start.canon/pixma. Download Canon Ts3122 Setup and install on your PC, laptop, etc. General steps to setup canon ts3122 include hardware installation, printer configuration, power connection establishment, Pixma TS3122 drivers installation, loading pepper sheets, and setting up the network connection. Find all steps and details for how to set up Canon Ts3122 Pixma printer on this page.

 

Canon Pixma ts3122 Setup 

  • Go to ij.start.canon/ts3122.
  • Canon Pixma ts3122 Setup download page appears.
  • Click the Download button.
  • A win-ts3122-1_1-n_mcd.exe will prompt.
  • Click Save File and Run.
  • Double-click to install Canon Ts3122 Setup.
  • Configure your PIXMA printer.
  • Connect to a network (Wireless or LAN).
  • Complete the Canon PIXMA ts3122 Setup.
  •  

Canon PIXMA TS3122 Specifications

Consisting of 4 x 6 Photo print with less than 65 seconds printing speed, you can use Fine Ink Cartridge & Fill Volume on your PIXMA TS3122 printer. Once you install Canon Ts3122 Setup and manage the printer setting wirelessly or via USB, you can use stunning print quality features with an extensive Canon PIXMA inkjet printer range. It offers 1-year warranty. PIXMA Software like My Printer Network Tool, My Image Garden10, MOBILE APP, and Canon PRINT app are easy to install for setting up Canon Ts3122. See following instructions.

 

Start Canon Pixma TS3122 Unboxing Setup

Before you access to download canon ts3122 setup from its official support site, unbox the printer and complete the PIXMA hardware configuration with the below steps; 

  • Firstly, remove all the packaging and protective tape from your printer’s carton.
  • Ensure all the components like power cable, disk, manual etc, are available.  
  • Locate your Canon PIXMA TS3122 on a dust-free surface near your computer system. 
  • Attach the power cable port to the power port of PIXMA. 
  • Make sure the power cable’s other end is plugged into a wall outlet.
  • Turn On the power-up button and set preferences on the Canon TS3122 display.
  • Load enough white papers on the input paper tray from the printer’s rear.
  • Install ink cartridges.
  • Install canon ts3122 setup using the installation CD.
  • Test printing your documents.
 
 
 

How do you download Canon PIXMA TS3122 drivers and software?  

Find the easiest method to download Canon PIXMA TS3122 setup and printer drivers, check below;

PIXMA TS3122 drivers & Downloads

  1. You can download two types of software for PIXMA TS3122, including XPS driver or MP software. To download the correct canon ts3122 setup driver, visit ij.start.canon/ts3122 on your web browser.
  2. You can also use ij.start.canon support site to download manuals for your PIXMA.
  3. Hence, click Set up.
  4. On the shown box, enter “ts3122,” which is your Canon printer model name.
  5. Click Download.
  6. Depending on your browser type, select 
  • Save As – chrome
  • Save – Internet Explorer
  • Run installer – Any other browser.
  1. The latest Canon PIXMA TS3122 drivers will begin to download.
  2. Double click the win-ts3122-1_1-n_mcd.exe or click Run to install the Canon TS3122 setup.
 
 
 

Install and Setup Canon ts3122: PIXMA Guidelines

  • Make sure you have downloaded Canon ts3122 drivers on your device successfully.
  • Either click “Run” or open Downlaods folder.
  • Double-click on the Canon Pixma TS3122 setup (canon icon).
  • Select preferred country and language, depending on your purchase location.
  • Following the installation process, Pixma software will extract printer files.
  • Set up a connection from the displayed screen. Thus, select one from Wireless connection, Wired LAN connection, or USB connection.
  • Click “I agree” once canon ts3122 software license agreement prompt. Make sure you’ve read all the terms carefully for future security. 
  • Follow on-screen instructions on your PC to finish the Setup Canon ts3122 installation process.
  • If you see the Test print page, then load the paper sheet and start printing with Pixma.
 
 
 

Canon PIXMA TS3122 Wireless Connection

Canon printer’s Wireless connection is one of the most commonly used and easiest methods to connect your printer and operating system to established printing features. So here we’ve also recommended instructions to build the wireless connection for your Canon PIXMA TS3122 printer, see below; 

Canon TS3122 Wireless Setup For Windows –

  • Make sure the canon ts3122 setup is downloaded.
  • Initially, enable the Easy Wireless Connect option on your PIXMA printer.
  • When the ON lamp starts flashing, press the Stop button.
  • Now, press and hold the Direct button.  
  • Once the Wi-Fi connection establishes, the Wi-Fi lamp will start blinking.
  • Tap the Start Setup button and choose a region.
  • Click Yes in the License Agreement window.
  • Hit Next and select the Method of Connection like Wireless connection.
  • Press WPS on your Wireless Router.
  • Enter key in the Network Key and wait for network setup and printhead alignment.
  • On the next screen, choose the list of additional software you want to install.
  • Your setup is complete once the software installation is over.

Canon TS3122 Wireless Setup For Mac –

  • Here steps for your mac and Pixma TS3122 wireless setup using WPS are mentioned.
  • Thus, enable the Wi-Fi option on your Canon TS3122 printerand mac.
  • Select a wireless network and enter the security key.
  • Press the Network button and release it when you see the Wireless icon flash.
  • On your router, push the WPS button.
  • Once Pixma and router connect Wirelessly, printer lamps become steady.
  • Now download Canon TS3122 setup from ij.start.canon/ TS3122 and install it.
  • Your Pixma printer is ready to print with Mac.
 
 

Canon Pixma Ts3122 Setup Disk Installation

You will receive setup canon ts3122 disk or Cd with your newly purchased Pixma printer, therefore instead of going through online download methods, you can install ts3122 disk setup –

  • Insert the Pixma CD into the computer disk port.
  • It will prompt ts3122 or ts3100 series installation wizard.
  • If you don’t find any pop-up, open disk volume from my computer.
  • Double-click on the Canon printer icon to start the installation.
  • Select your language and region. 
  • Accept the Ts3122 Setup license terms.
  • Choose connection type and follow other prompts on the computer display.
  • Once you install Canon Ts3122 Setup successfully, remove the disk.
 
 
 

How to start printing with Canon Pixma Ts3122 printer?

  • Turn on your Pixma printer.
  • Open paper tray and fill plain papers.
  • Adjust the paper tray using Ts3122’s edge.
  • On your operating system, open the file you wish to print.
  • On your keyboard, press CTRL and P at once.
  • The print Dialog box on the system screen appears, so set the printing copies number.
  • Click OK.
  • Wait for your Pixma Ts3122 to give printed sheets.
 

Canon Pixma TS3122 Mobile Printing

Pixma TS3122 offers mobile printing features for wireless setup, for it;

  • Make sure your Mobile Data is ON.
  • Open the App Store on your mobile, such as Google Play Store, Apple store, etc.
  • Search the Canon print app and find the preferred Canon print application.
  • Tap on Install to begin download.  
  • Go to File Manager and browse to the document you wish to print.
  • Tap on the Print option and see Print preview.
  • If required, customize the document.
  • Find your Canon Pixma TS3122 available nearby.
  • Click on Pixma TS3122 printer and proceed with the on-screen instructions to print the file.
 
 
 

How do you Scan With Canon TS3122?

Perform scan functions with your Pixma that is installed with Canon TS3122 Setup. See following guidelines mentioned below to scan.

Canon Pixma TS3122Scan –

  • See if the IJ Scan Utility tool is available on your system. If not, then open the official Canon support site to download the IJ Scan Utility tool for Canon Pixma ts3122 setup.
  • Install and launch the IJ Scan Utility tool.
  • See whether your Pixma ts3122 name is enlisted or not.
  • Locate the document on the ADF or the Platen.
  • Recheck and verify the sheets are of folded edges.
  • On the IJ Scan tool, click Auto, Photo, or Document.
  • Canon ts3122 setup with the IJ Scan tool will display a preview, therefore save it for future reference after scanning.
 
 
 

How to Troubleshoot Canon Pixma TS3122 issues?

Canon Pixma TS3122 or even Canon’s any printer series offers support if you face any or issues. However, there are many possible ways that you can use to resolve and troubleshoot Pixma TS3122 printer issues.

  • If you find your Canon Pixma TS3122 is not printing a paper, check the FINE cartridge holder if jammed papers are there. Then keep the FINE cartridge holder side and pull jammed paper to remove all paper.
  • Make sure you clean your Canon printer cartridge from time to time.
  • If you are sure that the printer has no issue founded, instead there is a software issue, then uninstall the previous TS3122 software and reinstall the Canon TS3122 setup to start fresh printing steps.
  • In other cases, you can read online manuals on ij.start.canon or directly contact Canon support.
